com.bmd.jrt.routine

Class ClassRoutineBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmd.jrt.routine.ClassRoutineBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RoutineBuilder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ObjectRoutineBuilder

    public class ClassRoutineBuilder
extends Object
implements RoutineBuilder
    Class implementing a builder of routines wrapping a class method.

    Note that only static methods can be asynchronously invoked through the routines created by this builder.

    Created by davide on 9/21/14.

    See Also:
    Async

    • Nested Class Summary

      • asyncMethod

        @Nonnull
public <INPUT,OUTPUT> Routine<INPUT,OUTPUT> asyncMethod(@Nonnull
                                                       String name)
        Returns a routine used for calling the method whose identifying name is specified in a Async annotation.
        Type Parameters:
        INPUT - the input data type.
        OUTPUT - the output data type.
        Parameters:
        name - the name specified in the annotation.
        Returns:
        the routine.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified method is not found.
        RoutineException - if an error occurred while instantiating the optional runner or the routine.

      • method

        @Nonnull
public Routine<Object,Object> method(@Nonnull
                                    String name,
                                    @Nonnull
                                    Class<?>... parameterTypes)
        Returns a routine used for calling the specified method.

        The method is searched via reflection ignoring an optional name specified in a Async annotation. Though, the other annotation attributes will be honored.

        Parameters:
        name - the method name.
        parameterTypes - the method parameter types.
        Returns:
        the routine.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if one of the parameter is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if no matching method is found.
        RoutineException - if an error occurred while instantiating the optional runner or the routine.

      • method

        @Nonnull
public <INPUT,OUTPUT> Routine<INPUT,OUTPUT> method(@Nonnull
                                                  Method method)
        Returns a routine used for calling the specified method.

        The method is invoked ignoring an optional name specified in a Async annotation. Though, the other annotation attributes will be honored.

        Type Parameters:
        INPUT - the input data type.
        OUTPUT - the output data type.
        Parameters:
        method - the method instance.
        Returns:
        the routine.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the specified method is null.
        RoutineException - if an error occurred while instantiating the optional runner or the routine.

      • method

        @Nonnull
protected <INPUT,OUTPUT> Routine<INPUT,OUTPUT> method(@Nonnull
                                                  RoutineConfiguration configuration,
                                                  @Nullable
                                                  String lockName,
                                                  @Nonnull
                                                  Class<?> targetClass,
                                                  @Nonnull
                                                  Method targetMethod)
        Returns a routine used for calling the specified method.
        Type Parameters:
        INPUT - the input data type.
        OUTPUT - the output data type.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the routine configuration.
        lockName - the lock name.
        targetClass - the target class.
        targetMethod - the target method.
        Returns:
        the routine.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the specified configuration, class or method are null.
        RoutineException - if an error occurred while instantiating the optional runner or the routine.
